title: Sam Altman and Elon Musk are racing to build an ‘everything app’
author: Alex Heath
description: Sam Altman’s Worldcoin project is quietly building a crypto social network to rival Elon Musk’s X.
content:
Altmans Worldcoin startup is about more than authenticating humans in the age of AGI.
